page.title: 03MY NEIGHBOURHOOD
page.content: My neighbouhood is mainly made up of {Council houses.}There are a few {Private houses}which differ from the others because the people who bought them changed the window frames and doors when they purchased them from the council.The people complained to the council that the houses were cold so they were then modernised,central heating was installed and they were pebbledashed on the outside.Our area is a{smokeless zone,}that means we can only burn a certain type of fuel on the fire. Near my home a new{Supermarket}called Kwik-save has recently opened.A supermarket is a shop in which you can buy almost anything.Local supermarkets have an age limit of 16 because of the problem of shop-lifting.
